mapper.select: select tdriver.driver_code driverCode, tdriver.name driverName, tdriver.phone driverPhone from t_store_information tstore, t_driver_information_manage tdriver where tdriver.is_delete = 0 and tstore.shop_code = #{storeCode} and tstore.provinceCode = tdriver.provinceCode and tstore.cityCode = tdriver.cityCode and tstore.distinctCode = tdriver.distinctCode

select tstore.shop_name storeName, tstore.shop_detail_address storeAddress, tstore.shop_invest_code storeInvitation, tuser.user_name userCode, tuser.user_image userImageUrl, tuser.user_name userName from t_store_information tstore, t_user_infomation tuser where tstore.is_delete = 0 and tstore.shop_code = #{storeCode} and tstore.shop_con_user = tuser.user_code
select name driverName, phone driverPhone, driver_image driverImageUrl, driver_acc driverNickName from t_driver_information_manage where is_delete = 0 and driver_code = #{driverCode}

select tdriver.provinceCode provinceCode, tdriver.cityCode cityCode, tdriver.distinctCode distinctCode, tstore.shop_detail_address tfriverdetailAddress, tstore.shop_name storeName, tuser.user_name userName, tuser.user_phone userPhone from t_store_information tstore, t_driver_information_manage tdriver, t_user_infomation tuser where tstore.shop_con_user = tuser.user_code and tstore.is_delete = 0 and tdriver.provinceCode = tstore.provinceCode and tdriver.cityCode = tstore.cityCode and tdriver.distinctCode = tstore.distinctCode and tdriver.driver_code = #{driverCode}

SELECT datas.name1 driverProvinceName, datas.name2 driverCityName, datas.dict_name driverDistinctName FROM t_driver_information_manage tdriver RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT t3.name1, t3.code1, t3.name2, t3.code2, t4.dict_name, t4.dict_code FROM ( SELECT t1.dict_code code1, t1.dict_name name1, t1.dict_parent_node parentcode1, t2.dict_code code2, t2.dict_name name2, t2.dict_parent_node parentcode2 FROM t_dict t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict t2 ON t1.dict_code = t2.dict_parent_node WHERE t1.dict_parent_node IS NULL ) t3 LEFT JOIN t_dict t4 ON t3.code2 = t4.dict_parent_node ) datas ON tdriver.is_delete = 0 AND tdriver.provinceCode = #{provinceCode} AND tdriver.cityCode = #{cityCode} AND tdriver.distinctCode = #{distinctCode} AND tdriver.provinceCode = datas.code1 AND tdriver.cityCode = datas.code2 AND tdriver.distinctCode = datas.dict_code HAVING driverName IS NOT NULL
